title: Was Summer Game Fest Good?
description:
How good was Summer Game Fest this year? 

Let's give it scores! From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N8hZAEIAMtg 

Download Vampire Survivors on Switch, PC, Xbox, and Mobile RIGHT NOW! PlayStation coming soon!


FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
